item.title: EP 06 - Stephen King Killed John Lennon? Part 2
item.itunes:title: Stephen King Killed John Lennon? Part 2
item.description:
Today we take an even closer look at the conspiracy to cover up John Lennon's true murderer, as well as the man who is fighting to bring this conspiracy to light.
